summary: TL*- THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING THE  2006 FORD F250  WITH N8700 FAILURE MILES AT 30 MPH ON A MODERATELY SNOWY DAY  BOTH WINDSHIELD WIPERS FELL OFF WITHOUT ANY WARNING.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER.  THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS WERE REPLACED, BUT THE CONTACT WAS CONCERNED THAT THE  PROBLEM  MIGHT REPEAT ITSELF.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 9000.*AK  UPDATED 04/05/07. *JB
